title: Explanations called from parliamentary employees
byline: The process of re-checking and updating the information of all MPs on the parliamentary website is underway following the discovery that some titles were fake, an informed source said.

title: Gazette issued on Sripada pilgrimage guidelines
byline: A gazette notification was issued to inform the general public about the guidelines they must strictly follow during the Sripada pilgrimage season, which commences today.

title: Security for former Presidents to be periodically reviewed
byline: In the wake of the decision to reduce the number of security personnel assigned to former Presidents, including Mahinda Rajapaksa, police said that the committee appointed to review security will meet periodically and assess reports to determine whether the number of personnel should be further reduced or increased.

title: Extreme heat worsens coconut shortage in Sri Lanka
byline: The high temperatures experienced during the first three months of this year have worsened Sri Lanka’s ongoing coconut shortage, alongside the increasing population of toque macaques, Head of the Department of Crop Science at the Ruhuna University and Senior Lecturer Professor K.K.I.U. Arunakumara said.

title: President accepts Speaker’s resignation; Parliament informed
byline: The Secretary to the President has informed the Secretary General of Parliament, in writing that the President has accepted the resignation of the Speaker, Asoka Ranwala, Communications Department of Parliament said.

title: South Korea’s President Yoon impeached over martial law bid
byline: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol was impeached on Saturday in a second vote by the opposition-led parliament over his short-lived attempt last week to impose martial law, a move that had shocked the nation and split his party.

title: Deputy Speaker shares his qualifications on social media
byline: In the wake of the controversy over the qualifications of certain politicians in the ruling party, Deputy Speaker Dr. Rizvie Salih has shared his qualifications on social media.
